name: A Rogue Pilot Pro
description:
"Down . . I'm down . . there going to hold me, but I'll escape!!"

"I'm not a pilot, but I'll manage to fly outta here!!!"

You've been captured by the enemy. You manage to escape. Since you are not a trained pilot, you are going to have a difficult time flying these aircraft. Its up to you to inflict maximum damage on the enemy. You have 4 aircraft to choose from.

--The fast and powerful Tornado
--The sleek and heavily armed Reaper Drone
--The classic WW2 War Plane
--The Navy Jet

Each aircraft has its own special abilities.

Hints : There are BONUS cut scene sequences when you destroy the Battleship and the Nuclear Reactor (White Cooling Tower)

Note : **These airplanes have been made intentionally difficult to fly. Please don't complain about bad controls. They are supposed to be bad - this guy is not a pilot.

To the female fans out there - we wish there were more models made for female pilots. They are few and far between. So, we had to use a dude in this game - sorry about that.
